Title: For the Next Millennium

Smith (based in part on the character Klaus from "The Vampire Diaries" novels by)

Plot: Klaus's family has yet to forgive Klaus's actions. Klaus's old friend decides to show up and show him Chaos. While Elijah tries to hunt werewolves down to protect Hayley leaving Freya on ...
